bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition in the course of harm caused by cold disease where evil heat abounds and floods the yang brilliance conduit, and then spreads through the entire body, but not forming dry nodes of the feces yet, with high fever, profuse sweating, much thirst, and a vast and massive movement in the vessels as regularly seen signs. Pu ji fang 普濟方 142: 遍身出汗，此為熱越，白虎證也 , “When one sweats all over his body, this is exuberant heat. It is the white tiger condition ”.
